name: Container base images with glibc & musl featuring Ariadne Conill, Alpine Linux TSC member & Chainguard SWE  (Ship It! #76)
summary: In todayâ€™s episode, we talk about distroless, ko, apko, melange, musl and glibc. The context is Wolfi OS, a community Linux OS designed for the container and cloud-native era. If you are looking for the lightest possible container base image with 0 CVEs and both glibc and musl support, Wolfi OS &amp; the related chaing...
